Title: Ek Paye Royecho Dariye
Actors: Aditi Bhattacharyya, Rana Das, Monisha Sarcar, Pravash Sarkar
Plot: A City Poet can't get a moment's peace as he has to compromise with the wrongs in society but he wrestles with his conscience and starts to recall his soul in his life. His endless search for his self has a deep impact on his family.
